comment: Enemy of the united states? Soros is a menace to humanity and the future of humankind itself
amr:
# ::snt Enemy of the united states? Soros is a menace to humanity and the future of humankind itself
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (e / enemy
            :polarity (a / amr-unknown)
            :domain (c / country
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "United"
                        :op2 "States")))
      :snt2 (m2 / menace-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Soros"))
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (h / humanity)
                  :op2 (f / future
                        :poss (h2 / humankind)))))
